Bites and Sites


There's so much to do and see in Virgin River. For the outdoor enthusiast, Virgin River is home to some of the best hunting and hiking trails around. If water is more your thing, try your hand at fishing or kayaking. At the end of the day, join the locals for food, friends, and fellowship.


  • Jack's Bar
  • The Corner Shop
  • Jensen's Stables
  • The Loving Cup
If you've been to Virgin River, you've been to Jack's Bar. Jack's is a place where locals and tourists can meet for a pint or two and relive the glory days. What's on the menu tonight? Whatever Preacher decides to make. Try it...you won't be disapponted! And for dessert, try one of Paige's pies. Heaven on a plate!
Need a little pick-me-up to get you through the day? Connie has a wide assortment of groceries, household goods, and gossip. Stop by mid-day to catch up on your favorite magazines and soap operas while you shop.
Newly opened! Jensen's Veterinary Practice has opened for riding lessons. Day camps available for middle schoolers who want to improve their equestrian skills. Other lessons by appointment. Call for horse boarding information.
Come get your caffeine rush from The Loving Cup. Open daily with free Wi-fi. The Loving Cup serves a wide variety of bakery goods in addition to hot and cold drinks. Poetry readings featured every Tuesday night.
